# Test that we get the same markdown output for a file with no directives
# a markdown file

preguide gen -out _output
! stdout .+
! stderr .+
cmp _output/myguide.md myguide/en.md.golden

-- myguide/en.md --
---
---
# Heading 1

This is a test
-- myguide/en.md.golden --
---
guide: myguide
lang: en
---
# Heading 1

This is a test
